TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN MEDICAL <AMI> REPURCHASING COMMON
TEXT.BODY: American Medical International said it intends to repurchase from time to time on the open market up to 150 mln dlrs of its common stock and plans to spend another 250 mln dlrs in reducing long-term debt. It said it would spend about 100 mln dlrs on debt maturing in 1989. American Medical said funding for the program will come from cash flow and from the divestiture and restructuring of corporate assets. Reuter
